subject: Shifter
description_text:
Hi,

I have actually ordered 2 shifters on separate order numbers.


Order 1 - 23/11/25
#SSN3776
SIMSONN PC USB 6+R H Simulator Gear Shifter × 1
6+R


Order 2 - 28/11/25
Order #SSN4040
Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter × 1


I would like to return the first order please (#SSN3776).

It has not been delivered yet so should I refuse to accept it or should I
accept delivery and return it myself?

Regards
Richard.

conversations.body_text: Hi Richard Jones,    We fully appreciate your disappointment at encountering a new release so soon after placing your order. However, we regret to inform you that we do not accept returns unless the product is faulty. Should you wish to return the item, you will need to send the parcel to our warehouse in Germany. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
